content: pattern is written in english in us crochet terms skill level intermediate visit my blog post to read about the sizing and materials https //www yarnique com/2019/07/10/coralyn-raglan/ coralyn is what crochet garment dreams are made of she features a beautiful lace yoke that s easier than it looks and half_double_crochet throughout the body for an easy breezy finish she s fully customizable with notes along the way to get the perfect fit as well as 3 different length options and 3 different sleeve length options the 12 page pdf includes a dozen photos color-coded sizing and a stitch chart she has been tested and i m available for any help you may need along the way you may not alter sell or distribute these patterns in any way you may sell finished items with credit to my blog and/or shop and using your own stock photos check out my blog for free knit and crochet patterns www yarnique com happy making chantal
